item.description:
****The meetup this month is 12/12, NOT 12/5, and it will NOT be at Bentara - read below***

Designers - this month we will be having a special Meetup at Phoenix Press. They have graciously agreed to host us, give us a tour of the facility, teach us about pre press and printing, and give us FREE FOOD.

PLEASE RSVP so they know how much free food to have.

Thanks!!
David

----------------

December 12th ?Meet Up? Host
Phoenix Press, Inc.
15 James Street
New Haven, CT 06513
Quality Printing since 1982

We are a full service family owned & operated Offset Printer, we employ 47 greatly skilled people in a 60,000sf facility, offering the following IN-HOUSE: Complete Electronic
Pre-Press Department (CTP); Conventional & Digital Presses (up to 40?) 1-6 Colors with Perfecting Capabilities; Print on Demand
Dept (B&W and Color) with in-line finishing; Full Service Conventional Bindery; Complete Mailing Dept.; Warehousing, Inventory & Fulfillment Services.

Please join us for a drink and a bite to eat this December 12th at 5:30pm.
While you?re here you can sit in on an abridged version of our Monthly Seminar:
~ Quick overview of how files run through or Pre-Press Dept., FTP, email, preflight, proofing
~ Understanding the difference between Raster and Vector
~ More focus on troubled files: common mistakes, spot colors in RGB, poor resolution images, registration text
~ Quick PDF overview: why PDF?, common pdf questions
~ Open Floor & Facility Tour
item.name: GNH Design and Marketing Holiday Party!
